entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who was set free by Harry.

entities.name: malfoy family
entities.description: The Malfoy family is mentioned as the previous owners of Dobby.

relationships.description: Harry set Dobby free from his old owners, the Malfoy family.
The Malfoy family was the previous owner of Dobby.
